forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally cloudy. High 3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High 38F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds. Low -3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 27F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 37F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low -1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low near 30F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain and snow. High 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow. Temps nearly steady in the mid 30s. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the evening. Precipitation transitioning to freezing drizzle overnight. Low -1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the evening. Precipitation transitioning to freezing drizzle overnight. Low near 30F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 80%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy early, then afternoon sunshine. High 4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy early, then afternoon sunshine. High 39F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low -2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 28F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Increasing clouds with showers arriving sometime in the afternoon. High 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy with some showers in the afternoon. High near 35F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain and freezing rain in the evening. Rain showers overnight. Low -1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain and freezing rain early...with rain showers overnight. Low 31F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 39F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low -1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 31F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning with precipitation turning to a mixture of rain and snow in the afternoon. High 4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early changing to mixed rain and snow later in the day. High 39F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 70%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low around 0C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 32F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with overcast skies later in the day. High near 5C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies later in the day. High 41F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low around 0C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 32F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers in the afternoon. High around 5C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers for the afternoon. High 41F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow showers early changing to mainly rain showers later on. Low 2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the evening changing to rain showers later on. Low near 35F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 6C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 42F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 36F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
